/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling activity of the city. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and cars.
